Title: Designates ordinance officers of the city of Mount Vernon police department as peace officers
Summary: Designates ordinance officers of the city of Mount Vernon police department as peace officers; authorizes such officers to carry a firearm while performing duties as a peace officer if appropriate license has been issued therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to designating the ordinance officers of the city of Mount Vernon police department as peace officers
